title: Everglades National Park: Visitor Demographics
body: Park Visitor Demographics       Visitor Survey Reports These studies are prepared to better understand the perceptions, needs, and wants of the visiting public and surrounding community. The outcome of these reports help park managers assess the effectiveness of the programs and facilities of the park. You can access past reports below.          2012 Visitor Survey Card Data Report (395 KB)            Impacts of Visitor Spending on Local Community 2008  (307 KB)            Visitor Study Report 2008 (622 KB)            South Florida Population Study 2006 (842 KB)           Visitor Study Report 2002 (199 KB)
